name: resorcinol-o,o'-diacetic acid

Additionally, the two acetate groups (-OCC(=O)O) contribute by increasing the molecular weight and providing more opportunities for intermolecular hydrogen bonding; each acetate group could add approximately +25°C to the melting point. The effects of the hydroxy and acetate groups are additive.
Test (Predicted reason):
